channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 1st Gen AMD EPYC™ Processors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 1st Gen AMD EPYC™ Processors

item.title: CVE-2022-27672|2024-07-31T20:10:42.286Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: When SMT is enabled, certain AMD processors may speculatively execute instructions using a target from the sibling thread after an SMT mode switch potentially resulting in information disclosure.
